content: Across the entire universe, there are infinite numbers of these massive spinning balls of matter, each with their own quirks and wonders, but without living beings on them to make anything of it, like what we have on Earth.
translations: ita:In tutto l'universo, ci sono un numero infinito di queste enormi sfere rotanti di materia, ognuna con le proprie stranez
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by DJ_Saidez (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
